content: what do you create for the skull lover in your life why make them a skull-in-tine this is a quick little stash buster that can be created in yarn or thread i have a video that you can also crochet too if you desire so come crochet with me https //youtu be/7l4rgx3amvq additional photos by my testers antionette kuhnert jen bee yvetto meador and margie smith
